CImagePool
Members
std::vector< CRefObj < CImagePoolImg > > m_available

list of free images in the pool

std::vector< CRefObj < CImagePoolImg > > m_inUse

list of inUse images in the pool

uint32 m_maxImages

maximum number of images to allocate in the pool. If 0 then there is no max.

uint32 m_width

width in pixels of each image in the pool

uint32 m_height

height in pixels of each image in the pool

uint32 m_bpp

width of each pixel in bits
